name: Rapidash
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: It gallops at nearly 150 mph. With its mane blazing ferociously, it races as if it were an arrow.

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Blaze Up
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a {R} Energy attached to Rapidash and this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
